channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Start Spreading The News: The Flu Loves New York
item.description: New York City is seeing an early, rapid spike of flu cases. This may not bode well for the season ahead.

item.title: The American voter is angry about one thing above all and Trump’s tariffs are in the crossfire, Goldman’s chief political economist says
item.description: Cost of living is the issue driving the midterms. Trump calls affordability a "hoax" when Democrats say it, but his tariff regime is showing cracks.

item.title: AI governance becomes a board mandate as operational reality lags
item.description: Fortune 500 companies are racing to formalize AI oversight.

item.title: Saturn’s Moon Titan May Not Have An Ocean After All, Says NASA
item.description: A new NASA study of data from its old Cassini mission to Saturn suggests that giant moon Titan may not have a global ocean — but that life could still...

item.title: Want a job in AI-era tech? Forget prestigious degrees—tech leaders want to see your GitHub projects and internships
item.description: As entry-level tech hiring slows, one CEO warns avoiding AI skills would be like “taking crazy pills”—and says Gen Z must show real proof of ability.

item.title: North Korea stole a record amount of crypto—again: report estimates its hackers’ 2025 haul at $2 billion
item.description: The country has now pilfered about $7 billion in crypto all-time.

item.title: Cisco Secure Email Attacks: 0-Day Exploit Confirmed, No Fix Available
item.description: A critical cyberattack is underway, Cisco has confirmed, targeting Cisco Secure Email with a CVSS-rated 10/10 zero-day vulnerability. Here’s what we k...

item.title: U.K. startup CellVoyant debuts AI platform that could radically reduce the cost of cell-based therapies such as CAR-T immunotherapy for cancer
item.description: CellVoyant says its FateView platform can reduce the cost of producing viable cells for therapy by up to 80%

item.title: Five Medical Breakthroughs Of 2025: Cancer, Heart, And Genetic Diseases
item.description: This year saw notable progress in head and neck cancers, Huntington's disease, personalized genetic therapy, and heart disease due to high cholesterol...

item.title: Say Goodbye To RSI With Kensington’s New Expert Mouse TB800 EQ Ergonomic Trackball
item.description: Kensington has announced its new Expert Mouse TB800 EQ Trackball. This finger-operated ergonomic trackball is fully programmable and provides precisio...

item.title: Trump announces $1,776 ‘warrior dividend’ for troops as economic worries persist
Why Trump Media is getting into the nuclear business with a $6 billion deal
In 5-to-4 vote, Bank of England opts to cut interest rates
It's a big morning for economic data. Here's what's coming.
Germany to issue a record $600 bln in bonds next year
FDA announces recall of frozen dessert pints over possible 'small stones'
item.description: The FDA announced a voluntary recall of non-dairy frozen dessert pints sold at stores nationwide over the potential presence of small stones.

item.title: Musk predicts AI will create 'universal high income' and make saving money unnecessary
item.description: Elon Musk dismisses Trump savings accounts, claiming AI will create "universal high income" and eliminate poverty, making saving unnecessary.

item.title: PayPal plans to launch bank serving small businesses around the US
item.description: PayPal files with Utah and the FDIC to launch PayPal Bank, an industrial loan company offering small business lending and FDIC-insured savings account...

item.title: Scott Bessent says real affordability relief, 'substantial drop' in inflation coming soon
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent predicts inflation relief and tax refunds for Americans in 2026, forecasting a "bountiful" economic year ahead for Ma...

item.title: iRobot co-founder says FTC's opposition to Amazon deal was 'wrong-minded' following bankruptcy filing
item.description: iRobot filed for bankruptcy and will be bought by Chinese manufacturer after Amazon's $1.4 billion acquisition was blocked by the FTC on antitrust gro...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
